mapper.insert: insert into car values(carseq.nextval, #{cid}, #{cname}, #{chp}, #{carname}, #{creg_day}, #{ccompany}, #{cmodel}, #{coption}, #{cprice},#{cmileage} ,#{cdnf}, #{caccident}, #{cimage}, #{ccontent}, sysdate, default)
mapper.update: update car set chp=#{chp}, carname=#{carname}, ccompany=#{ccompany}, cmodel=#{cmodel}, creg_day=TO_DATE(#{creg_day}), cmileage=#{cmileage}, coption=#{coption}, cdnf=#{cdnf}, caccident=#{caccident}, cprice=#{cprice}, cimage=#{cimage}, ccontent=#{ccontent} where cnum = #{cnum}
mapper.select: select max(cprice) from car where cmodel = #{cmodel}
select min(cprice) from car where cmodel = #{cmodel}
mapper.update: update car set status=1 where cnum=#{cnum}
mapper.select: select * from car order by cnum
select * from car where cnum=#{pnum} order by cnum desc
select * from car order by inputdate desc
select cname,cid,count(status) as cnt from car where status=1 and inputdate <= sysdate and inputdate >=sysdate-30 group by cname,cid order by cnt desc, cname
